name: functions.distributions.permissions.set
desc: Set the access type of a custom slack function and define the users, team or org ids to be granted access if permission_type is set to named_entities

function_app_id.desc: The encoded ID of the app.

function_callback_id.desc: The callback ID defined in the function's definition file.

function_id.desc: The encoded ID of the function.

org_ids.desc: List of org IDs to allow for named_entities permission.

permission_type.desc: The type of permission that defines how the function can be distributed.

team_ids.desc: List of team IDs to allow for named_entities permission.

errors.access_denied: This actor does not have access to the permissions on this resource.
errors.invalid_named_entities: One or more of the named entities was not found
errors.invalid_permission_type: This function requires permission_type to be set as named_entities before adding users.
errors.user_not_found: One or more of the named entities was not found.
